name: Tristakto
description:
Think you like fit-a-block games? Or maybe lining up those blocks into neat little lines of 5 is more your style? Well, Tristakto is for you!

Tristakto is a game for one or two players where you place oddly shaped pieces to make five-in-a-row of a single color. But watch out - fill up an entire horizontal row of blocks and poof they're gone, along with your current strategy!

A game by Micha Faw, with additional design consulting by Carla Castillo.
